import jsPDF from"jspdf";import"jspdf-autotable";export var generatePDF=function generatePDF(selectedOption,inputData,tableDataA,tableData,tableDataB){var doc=new jsPDF();var logoScale=0.8;var footerScale=1.4;var xLeft=15;var xRight=155;// Calculate Total Amount
var totalSumA=tableDataA.reduce(function(acc,obj){return acc+Number(obj.quantity*obj.rate);},0);var totalSum=tableData.reduce(function(acc,obj){return acc+Number(obj.quantity*obj.rate);},0);var totalFinalSum=totalSumA+totalSum;// Parsing Corporate Discount
var corpDiscount;if(selectedOption==="QUOTE"){corpDiscount=inputData.input_6;}else if(selectedOption!=="PAYROLL"){corpDiscount=inputData.input_5;}else{corpDiscount=0;}var corpDiscountAmt;if(selectedOption!=="PAYROLL"){if(typeof(corpDiscount==="string")&&corpDiscount.includes("%")){// if % sign
var _corpDiscount=corpDiscount.substring(0,corpDiscount.length-1);corpDiscountAmt=totalFinalSum*_corpDiscount/100;}else{// if no % sign
corpDiscountAmt=corpDiscount;}}var discountedTotalFinalSum=totalFinalSum-corpDiscountAmt;// y-coordinate tracker
var currY=0;// MFTS logo
var imgData=require("./MFTS_logo.png");doc.addImage(imgData,"PNG",65,// X coordinate of the image
5,// Y coordinate of the image
Math.trunc(96*logoScale),// Width of the image
Math.trunc(30*logoScale)// Height of the image
);// Header
doc.setFont("helvetica");doc.setFontSize(9);if(selectedOption!=="PAYROLL"){// Add content to the PDF document using the input data
doc.text("To: ".concat(inputData.input_0),xLeft,35);// To
if(selectedOption==="INV"&&inputData.input_6!==""){doc.text("TRN: ".concat(inputData.input_6),xLeft,40);doc.text("Address: ".concat(inputData.input_1),xLeft,45);// Address
currY=55;}else{doc.text("Address: ".concat(inputData.input_1),xLeft,40);// Address
currY=50;}doc.text("Date: ".concat(inputData.input_2),xRight,35);// Date
doc.text("Quote/Invoice#: ".concat(inputData.input_3),xRight,40);// DocNum
}else{currY=38;}// Document Type
doc.setFontSize(14);if(selectedOption==="ACKRECEIPT"){doc.text("ACKNOWLEDGEMENT RECEIPT",70,currY);}else if(selectedOption==="INV"){doc.text("INVOICE",95,currY);}else if(selectedOption==="QUOTE"){doc.text("QUOTATION",90,currY);}else if(selectedOption==="SOA"){doc.text("STATEMENT OF ACCOUNT",70,currY);}else if(selectedOption==="PAYROLL"){doc.text("PAYROLL ".concat(inputData.input_1),83,currY);}// Title of the Document. Set the text to center align
currY=currY+7;var textWidth=0;doc.setFontSize(11);if(selectedOption!=="PAYROLL"){textWidth=doc.getTextWidth(inputData.input_4);var pageWidth=doc.internal.pageSize.width;var centerX=(pageWidth-textWidth)/2;doc.text("".concat(inputData.input_4),centerX,currY);// Add the centered text to the PDF document
currY=currY+5;}else if(selectedOption==="PAYROLL"){textWidth=doc.getTextWidth(inputData.input_2)+doc.getTextWidth(inputData.input_0+3);// for PAYROLL, title is index #2
var _pageWidth=doc.internal.pageSize.width;var _centerX=(_pageWidth-textWidth)/2;doc.text("".concat(inputData.input_2," - ").concat(inputData.input_0),_centerX,45);// Add the centered text to the PDF document
currY=50;}// Particulars Table
doc.setFontSize(10);if(tableDataA.length>0){// doc.text(`PARTICULARS:`, xLeft, currY);
doc.autoTable({startY:currY,columnStyles:{0:{columnWidth:85},1:{columnWidth:12},2:{columnWidth:12},3:{columnWidth:23},4:{columnWidth:30},5:{columnWidth:20}},headStyles:{halign:"center",fillColor:[120,120,120],fontSize:8,lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},bodyStyles:{fontSize:8,lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},footStyles:{halign:"left",fillColor:[190,190,190],textColor:[0,0,0],fontSize:8,lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},head:[["Particulars","Qty","Unit","Rate","Amount","Remarks"]],body:tableDataA.map(function(row){var description=row.description,quantity=row.quantity,unit=row.unit,rate=row.rate,remarks=row.remarks;return[description,quantity,unit,rate,quantity*rate,remarks];}),// foot: [["Subtotal", "", "", "", `${totalSumA}   AED`, ""]],
foot:[["","","","","".concat(totalSumA.toLocaleString("en-US",{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2}),"   AED"),""]],theme:"striped"});currY=currY+tableDataA.length*6+10;}// Materials Table
if(tableData[0].description!==""){// doc.text(`MATERIALS:`, xLeft, currY);
currY+=2;doc.autoTable({// startY: currY,
columnStyles:{0:{columnWidth:85},1:{columnWidth:12},2:{columnWidth:12},3:{columnWidth:23},4:{columnWidth:30},5:{columnWidth:20}},headStyles:{halign:"center",fillColor:[120,120,120],fontSize:8,lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},footStyles:{halign:"left",fillColor:[190,190,190],textColor:[0,0,0],fontSize:8,lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},bodyStyles:{fontSize:8,lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},head:[["Materials","Qty","Unit","Rate","Amount","Remarks"]],body:tableData.map(function(row){var description=row.description,quantity=row.quantity,unit=row.unit,rate=row.rate,remarks=row.remarks;return[description,quantity,unit,rate,quantity*rate,remarks];}),foot:[["","","","","".concat(totalSum.toLocaleString("en-US",{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2}),"   AED"),""]],theme:"striped"});currY=currY+tableData.length*6+20;}// Total row
// Corporate Discount row
if(corpDiscount!==""&&selectedOption!=="PAYROLL"){var totalrow=[["Subtotal:","".concat(totalFinalSum.toLocaleString("en-US",{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2}),"   AED")]];var discRow=[["Corporate Discount: ".concat(corpDiscount),"(".concat(corpDiscountAmt.toLocaleString("en-US",{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2}),")   AED")]];var discountedTotalRow=selectedOption!=="ACKRECEIPT"?[["TOTAL:","".concat(discountedTotalFinalSum.toLocaleString("en-US",{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2}),"   AED")]]:[["TOTAL PAID:","".concat(discountedTotalFinalSum.toLocaleString("en-US",{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2}),"   AED")]];doc.autoTable({columnStyles:{0:{columnWidth:132,halign:"left"}},headStyles:{fontStyle:"normal",fontSize:8,fillColor:[210,210,210],textColor:[0,0,0],lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},bodyStyles:{fontSize:8,lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},footStyles:{fontStyle:"bold",fillColor:[250,240,0],// lime
fontSize:8,textColor:[0,0,0],lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},head:[totalrow[0]],body:[discRow[0]],foot:[discountedTotalRow[0]],theme:"striped"});totalFinalSum=discountedTotalFinalSum;// for when it is needed to export the final sum
}else if(corpDiscount===""||selectedOption==="PAYROLL"){var _totalrow=selectedOption!=="ACKRECEIPT"?[["TOTAL:","".concat(totalFinalSum.toLocaleString("en-US",{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2}),"   AED")]]:[["TOTAL PAID:","".concat(totalFinalSum.toLocaleString("en-US",{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2}),"   AED")]];doc.autoTable({columnStyles:{0:{columnWidth:132,halign:"left"}},bodyStyles:{fontStyle:"bold",fillColor:[250,240,0],// lime
fontSize:8,textColor:[0,0,0],lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},body:[_totalrow[0]],theme:"plain"});}if(tableDataB[0].description!==""){var scopeOfWork=[["Scope of Work","Remarks"]];doc.autoTable({headStyles:{halign:"center",fillColor:[120,120,120],fontSize:8,lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},bodyStyles:{fontSize:8,lineColor:[0,0,0],lineWidth:0.1},head:[scopeOfWork[0]],body:tableDataB.map(function(row){var description=row.description,remarks=row.remarks;return[description,remarks];}),theme:"striped"});}if(selectedOption==="QUOTE"){doc.setFontSize(11);doc.text("Project Duration: ".concat(inputData.input_5),xLeft,200);doc.setFontSize(8);doc.text("Terms and Agreement:",xLeft,208);if(inputData.input_8){doc.text("1. ".concat(inputData.input_8,"% downpayment upon confirmation of this quotation, and ").concat(100-inputData.input_8,"% upon completion of the project. Work will not commence otherwise."),xLeft,213);}else{doc.text("1. No advance payment is required.",xLeft,213);}if(inputData.input_7){// if Warranty field is populated
doc.text("2. Warranty is valid for ".concat(inputData.input_7," starting from date of project commencement."),xLeft,218);}}if(selectedOption!=="PAYROLL"){imgData=require("./Footer2.png");doc.addImage(imgData,"PNG",xLeft-3,// X coordinate of the image
221,// Y coordinate of the image
Math.trunc(132*footerScale),// Width of the image
Math.trunc(52*footerScale)// Height of the image
);}// Save the PDF document
if(selectedOption==="QUOTE"){doc.save("".concat(inputData.input_3," - ").concat(inputData.input_2," - ").concat(inputData.input_0,".pdf"));}else if(selectedOption==="ACKRECEIPT"){doc.save("ACKRECEIPT - ".concat(inputData.input_3," - ").concat(inputData.input_2," - ").concat(inputData.input_0,".pdf"));}else if(selectedOption!=="PAYROLL"){doc.save("".concat(inputData.input_3," - ").concat(inputData.input_2," - ").concat(inputData.input_0,".pdf"));}else if(selectedOption==="PAYROLL"){doc.save("".concat(inputData.input_1," - ").concat(inputData.input_0,".pdf"));}};
